title: [Large-scale] TPACK-based Mathematics Teacher Training: SQD-integrated Online Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Pedagogical Knowledge and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: A program focused on real-time collaboration and enhancing practical TPACK competencies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Participants can integrate the six elements of the SQD strategy (role modeling, reflection, lesson design, collaboration, real-world application, feedback) into online math classes.
Participants can analyze TPACK components (technological, pedagogical, and content knowledge) and develop math lesson plans utilizing digital teaching aids.
Participants can improve their lesson designs through peer evaluation in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
